sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { minutesToDuration, secondsToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function Subtitle({ session, breakDuration, focusDuration, onBreak }) { if(session != null) { return (
{/* TODO: This area should show only when there is an active focus or break - i.e. the session is running or is paused */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) total duration */}

{session?.label} for {onBreak ? breakDuration : focusDuration} minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below correctly format the time remaining in the current session */}

{secondsToDuration(session?.timeRemaining)} remaining

) } return null } export default Subtitle
